text:
identitii | Onsite | Sydney, Australia | Full-time Developers | Good wifi speed from hammock on the roof | AUD$100-150k + equity

Looking for great people to come join us and help build our product. We're funded, we have a plan, and we have a lot of work to do :)

Senior and junior, frontend and backend.

Currently ~20 people.

Keywords: golang, vue.js, k8s, elasticsearch, graph, ethereum, fintech, rooftop bar (you never know, people might search for that)

Email (CTO): elliot@identitii.com
